title: Motley Fool Money: 07.25.2014
description: Shares of Facebook hit a new high. Chipotle serves up big gains.  Amazon stumbles. And Apple rises. Our analysts discuss some of the week's big earnings news and take stock in the business of Comic-Con.
content:encoded: Shares of Facebook hit a new high. Chipotle serves up big gains.  Amazon stumbles. And Apple rises. Our analysts discuss some of the week's big earnings news and take stock in the business of Comic-Con.
